summary: An email from an FBI agent in Paris introducing themselves as a replacement and requesting to touch base regarding the Epstein case. The document shows FBI coordination on the case across international offices.

persons.name: (PA) (FBI)
persons.context: The sender of the email, an FBI agent based in Paris who is new and replacing someone else.

persons.name: (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: The recipient of the email, an FBI agent based in New York, whom the sender wishes to discuss the Epstein case with.

connections.description: FBI colleagues in different field offices (Paris and New York) coordinating on the Epstein case.

events.title: FBI Paris agent reaches out to NY agent
events.description: A new FBI agent in Paris sends an email to an FBI agent in New York to touch base and discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI had personnel assigned to the Epstein case in both Paris and New York field offices as of September 2019.
A new FBI agent in Paris replaced a previous agent and was initiating contact with the New York office regarding the case.
The email indicates ongoing international coordination and investigation into the Epstein case by the FBI.
